tech_stack_table.Description: A framework for building server-rendered Vue.js applications.
A typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.
An ORM for Node.js and TypeScript.
Amazon Web Services, a cloud computing platform.
A web performance and security company.
A platform for frontend frameworks and static sites.
A C-language library that implements a small, fast, self-contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database.
